parameters.name: Accessibility
parameters.description:
The job visibility. Valid values:

*   PUBLIC: The job is visible to all members in the workspace.
*   PRIVATE: The job is visible only to you and the administrator of the workspace.

parameters.name: BusinessUserId
parameters.description: The ID of the user associated with the job.

parameters.name: Caller
parameters.description: The caller.

parameters.name: DisplayName
parameters.description: The job name. Fuzzy query is supported. The name is case-insensitive. Wildcards are not supported. For example, if you enter test, test-job1, job-test, job-test2, or job-test can be matched, and job-t1 cannot be matched. The default value null indicates any job name.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time of the query. Use the job creation time to filter data. The default value is the current time.

parameters.name: FromAllWorkspaces
parameters.description: Specifies whether to query a list of jobs across workspaces. This parameter must be used together with `ShowOwn=true`. You can use this parameter to query a list of jobs recently submitted by the current user.

parameters.name: JobId
parameters.description: The job ID. Fuzzy query is supported. The name is case-insensitive. Wildcards are not supported. The default value null indicates any job ID.

parameters.name: JobType
parameters.description:
The job type. The default value null indicates any type. Valid values:

*   TFJob
*   PyTorchJob
*   XGBoostJob
*   OneFlowJob
*   ElasticBatchJob

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The sorting order. Valid values:

*   desc (default)
*   asc

parameters.name: OversoldInfo
parameters.description:
The Idle resource information. Valid values:

*   ForbiddenQuotaOverSold
*   ForceQuotaOverSold
*   AcceptQuotaOverSold-true (true indicates that the job uses idle resources.)
*   AcceptQuotaOverSold-false (false indicates that the job uses guaranteed resources.)

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return for the current query. Minimum value: 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of jobs per page.

parameters.name: PaymentType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource. Valid values:

*   PrePaid: Resource quota
*   Spot: Preemptible resources
*   PostPaid: Public resources

parameters.name: PipelineId
parameters.description: The specific pipeline ID used to filter jobs.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The resource group ID. For information about how to obtain the ID of a dedicated resource group, see [Manage resource quota](~~2651299~~).

parameters.name: ResourceQuotaName
parameters.description: The resource quota name used to filter jobs. Fuzzy search is supported. Wildcards are not supported. The default value null indicates that jobs are not filtered by resource quota name.

parameters.name: ShowOwn
parameters.description: Specifies whether to query only the jobs submitted by the current user.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description:
The sorting field. Valid values:

*   DisplayName
*   JobType
*   Status
*   GmtCreateTime
*   GmtFinishTime

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the query. Use the job creation time to filter data. The default value is the current time minus seven days. In other words, if you do not configure the StartTime and EndTime parameters, the system queries the job list in the last seven days.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The job status. Valid values:

*   Creating
*   Queuing
*   Bidding (only available for spot jobs that use Lingjun resources)
*   EnvPreparing
*   SanityChecking
*   Running
*   Restarting
*   Stopping
*   SucceededReserving
*   FailedReserving
*   Succeeded
*   Failed
*   Stopped

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags.

parameters.name: UserIdForFilter
parameters.description: The user ID used to filter jobs.

parameters.name: Username
parameters.description: The username used to filter jobs. Fuzzy search is supported. Wildcards are not supported. The default value null indicates that jobs are not filtered by username.

parameters.name: WorkspaceId
parameters.description: The workspace ID.
